This item is now Free. Changes: 3.0.6-1

- Revert Snapchat changes
- Fix Clock app crashes


Changes: Eclipse 3.0.6

- New feature: Quit all apps in settings
- Fixes for Twitter app
- Fixes for Instagram app
- Fixes for Messenger app
- Snapchat ban prevention
- Improve force touch on phone app
- Bug fix for "set wallpaper" buttons

- Patch for Clock app on iOS 9.2+
- Compatibility fixes for latest jailbreak
- Actually fixes twitter's search bar (latest version) - Fixes Twitter bugs
- Rearranged settings menu to avoid confusion

- Compatible with Snapchat 9.35+ - Fixes for WhatsApp

- Improved support for Twitter

- Added support for Instagram (8.2)
- Added support for Twitter (6.55)
- Updated to support the latest snapchat release
- Added a quick support feature with FAQ (in settings)
- Fixes for Whatsapp
- Application loading show be faster now.

- Currently looking into issues with Google Docs, Notes, and Music App.
